title: ping ricochet
body:
Ever since this night https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/GFqYJBPz-ping-ping-increase-between-today-and-yesterday?comment=0001
my ping has not been stable. I have never had a problem with my ping as it has always been constant and now it goes up and down which takes away the enjoyment out of this game for me as it is only this game. until this gets fixed think im done with league

replies.body:
If this is related to the ping spikes in NY that Broporo was talking about, it may be worth contacting your ISP to ask them if there are any routing problems that are still affecting you.

There are some things that we can try out to start though. First, always make sure you are on a hard line connection if you can help it. It will always be more reliable and consistent than not being on one. Next, have you made sure your firewall is not trying to inhibit LoL? You can make double sure it's not by [**following these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3); you'd be surprised how much it can get in the way for something trying to help you. Try out the steps and let me know if you still see high ping by playing a could custom games!
